summary.Title: Kitchen staff for Greater Copenhagen

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you have experience with kitchen work and do you want to work in a company with a busy work flow?

HumanizeR is looking for experienced and professionally skilled kitchen staff as well as dishwashers for our costumers in and around Greater Copenhagen, when they are need of extra hands in the kitchen.

We are looking for kitchen assistants and helpers, who are passionate about making delicious food and able to make lunch for 200 to 1200 employees. These are both short-term and long-term temporary positions.

As we place great emphasis on flexibility and would like to give you the opportunity to manage your work week yourself, we have an app that makes it possible for you to sign up for desired shifts that match your schedule.

Working hours are monday to friday between 7:00 – 15:00

Your primary focus will be

  • Producing cold and warm dishes
  • Salads and homebaked bread
  • Goods receipt

We can offer you

  • Salary with supplements according to employers agreement
  • Possibility of permanent employment
  • Opportunily to manage your schedule that match you

We expect that you

  • Have experience / training from similar positions
  • Master the produktion of warm food, cold dishes and salads
  • Prepared to be working in shifting locations

Is it you that we are looking for?

Apply for the position by the link below and if you have any questions about the position, you are welcome to call us on telephone number 53 53 11 99. The office's opening hours are week days from 8 Am to 4 Pm

Due to the Personal Data Ordinance, we do not receive CVs and applications by email, but only via link.

HumanizeR is a 100% Danish-owned temporary staffing and recruitment company. We have a strategy of adding value to our clients and candidates. Among other things, we deliver staff and HR solutions within finance, administration, kitchen / canteen, cleaning and crafts. We encourage everyone to apply for the position regardless of nationality, religion or disability. HumanizeR actively and consciously collaborates with our customers on CSR and HR. See more at www.HumanizeR.dk
